Report Abuse I certainly hope the protesters succeed in removing most of the old guard from government. The worst mistake my country made when it finally transitioned into democracy, a full decade ago, was to keep most of the government bureacratic aparatus in place, as well as leaving intact the most corrupted parts of the previous regime's establishment, such as worker's unions. This eventually made it so that we now face the prospect of having the very same people ruling the country regardless of who wins an election...
